verses.roman:
prabhāte ācāryaratna dolāya caḍāñā
bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge āilā śacīmātā lañā

synonyms: prabhāte—in the morning; ācāryaratna—Candraśekhara; dolāya—in a palanquin; caḍāñā—seating; bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge—with devotees; āilā—came; śacī-mātā—mother Śacī; lañā—bringing.
translation: In the morning Candraśekhara brought Śacīmātā from her house with many devotees, and he seated her in a palanquin.
